description:
Our client, a leading social media company, is seeking a REMOTE Business Analyst to join their team. Candidates must currently reside in the EST timezone and will adhere to local hours. This person will join a Global Sales Strategy & Operations team, supporting key strategic partners across sales strategy and analytics, operations and process and tools, supporting EMEA.
• *This role is a 6-month W2 position to start. It is eligible for extension or conversion to FTE based on need and performance.**

Responsibilities:
• Generate weekly metric decks, providing deep business analyses, and deriving actionable insights to guide decision-making and strategy development.
• Analyze business performance using structured data to gain insights into customer interactions with products/services
• Lead project execution; develop work plans, gather and synthesize data, conduct analyses, and formulate final recommendations to enhance operational processes and systems.
• Collaborate with the Sales Strategy team, key sales leaders, and cross-functional departments (Finance, Marketing, Measurement, Product) on strategic projects to boost revenue, sales productivity, and efficiency.

Desired Experience:
• At least 4 years of experience in strategy and operations within management consulting, investment banking, tech, or media.
• Knowledge of sales, digital advertising platforms, and sales systems and tools, including a working understanding of Google Suite and possibly Salesforce.
• Strong analytical and quantitative abilities, with experience or familiarity in SQL, Tableau, or similar dashboarding tools,
